statements: UPDATE TransportationData SET distance = 150.5, fuel_consumed = 12.3 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TransportationData SET start_location = 'City A', end_location = 'City B', carbon_emissions = 5.2 WHERE route_name = 'Route XYZ';
UPDATE TransportationData SET distance = 150, fuel_consumed = 12.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TransportationData SET carbon_emissions = 10.7, start_location = 'New York', end_location = 'Chicago' WHERE route_name = 'Highway 1';

UPDATE TransportationRoutes SET distance = distance + 10, time_estimate = 120 WHERE route_id = 1;
